projects.title: Recycling and Waste Management Platform
projects.description: An educational platform dedicated to teaching people about the importance of protecting our environment through recycling. It provides practical tips, guides, and resources to encourage sustainable waste management practices.

projects.title: RECA (Rwanda Conservation Environment Agency)
projects.description: RECA is dedicated to climate innovation, environmental conservation, and youth empowerment in Rwanda. It integrates technology for real-time environmental monitoring, promotes community-led ecosystem restoration, and advances education-driven initiatives aligned with the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

projects.title: Blog API
projects.description: A backend RESTful API for managing blog posts and users.
